content: rule the roost with this playful crochet chicken bag stitched in red heart super saver this purse is worked in pieces before being joined together the legs beak and comb are crocheted separately and added to complete the look practice increases decreases single_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch and more the strap is stitched in row of 2 double_crochet clusters making it easy to customize the length make a farm-fresh fashion statement with this charming crochet bag materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a soft white 0316 1 ball or 295 yds/270 m contrast b cherry red 0319 1 ball or 109 yds/100 m contrast c saffron 0234 1 ball or 54 yds/50 m measurements approx 10 25 5 cm wide x 8 20 5 cm high x 2 5 cm deep not including strap feet or beak
